objects.text:
• 8GB RAM + 128GB Storage
• 50MP Main Camera with OIS
• Metal Frame & IP67 Water Resistant
• sAMOLED with Vision Booster

product_details.name: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G (Awesome Iceblue, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | Metal Frame | 50 MP Main Camera (OIS) | Nightography | IP67 | Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ | sAMOLED with Vision Booster
product_details.description: OS: Android 14. RAM: 8 GB. Package Dimensions: 17.7 x 9.3 x 2.7 cm; 213 g. Batteries: 1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included). Wireless communication technologies: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi. Connectivity technologies: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB, NFC. GPS: True. Special features: Fast Charging Support, Dual SIM, Always On Display, Built-In GPS, Mobile Hotspot Capability. Other display features: Wireless. Device interface - primary: Touchscreen. Resolution: FHD+ 2340 x 1080. Other camera features: Rear, Front. Audio Jack: USB Type C. Form factor: Bar. Colour: Awesome Iceblue. Battery Power Rating: 5000 Milliamp Hours. Whats in the box: Smartphone,Data Cable (Type C-to-C),SIM Ejector Pin,Quick Start Guide,,. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 213 g. Importer: Samsung India Electronics Pvt. Ltd. having its Registered Office at: 6th Floor, DLF Centre, Sansad Marg, New Delhi – 110001 Email us at: support.india@samsung.com Tel (Toll Free): 1800 40 7267864. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Smartphone.

banner_details:
The banner features a bold promotional design focused on a smartphone flash sale. The background consists of a dual diagonal color split with deep navy blue to cyan gradient and subtle geometric overlays. At the top left, a large, high-impact heading (`heading`) captures attention in white bold text. Just below, a stylish subheading (`subheading`) in light cyan introduces the product name. A feature list (`description`) follows in smaller white text. A highlighted orange tagline (`tagline`) emphasizes urgency. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large white font. A red rounded button (`cta_background` and `cta`) invites immediate action, while a semi-transparent offer bar (`offer_overlay` and `offer_timer`) below reinforces limited-time urgency. A high-resolution product image (`product_image`) is placed on the right, extending visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#001F3F`
- Sky Blue: `#0074D9`
- Cyan: `#7FDBFF`
- Orange: `#FF851B`
- Red: `#FF4136`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the Samsung Galaxy A55 5G features a cool, refined color palette dominated by icy blue and ethereal purples. The back panel uses a pearl white (#F3F8FC) with subtle hints of silver (#D6E5F2), giving it a sleek, premium appearance. The camera rings and branding are accented in slate gray (#2D2D2D). The display showcases a vibrant mix of deep indigo (#4B5BBF) and violet (#A087FB), fading into dreamy pastel hues with soft gradients of lavender (#DCCEF9) and light cyan (#CFF4F9). This color blending offers visual depth while accentuating brightness, making it ideal for tech-focused, futuristic advertisement banners.
